00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <debug/debug.h>

00005 const unsigned long usedListExpansionSize = 1024;
00006 
00007 void init_used_list(process_t* process)
00008 {
00009         process->m_usedListRoot = (MEM_LOC*) malloc(1024);
00010         process->m_usedListSize = 1024;
00011         process->m_usedListLocation = 0;
00012 }
00013 
00014 void expand_used_list(process_t* process)
00015 {
00016         MEM_LOC* new_loc = (MEM_LOC*) malloc(process->m_usedListSize + usedListExpansionSize);
00017 
00018         memcpy(new_loc, process->m_usedListRoot, process->m_usedListSize);
00019 
00020         free(process->m_usedListRoot);
00021 
00022         process->m_usedListSize += usedListExpansionSize;
00023         process->m_usedListRoot = new_loc;
00024 }

00027 int fzero = 0;

00029 MEM_LOC used_list_top(process_t* process)
00030 {
00031         MEM_LOC* ulocation = process->m_usedListRoot;
00032         return *ulocation;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void used_list_add(process_t* process, MEM_LOC location)
00036 {
00037         if (process->m_usedListSize == process->m_usedListLocation)
00038         {
00039                 //Gotta expand the used list
00040                 expand_used_list(process);
00041         }
00042 
00043         MEM_LOC* ulocation = process->m_usedListRoot;
00044         ulocation = (MEM_LOC*) (((MEM_LOC) ulocation) + ((MEM_LOC)process->m_usedListLocation));
00045 
00046         *ulocation = location;
00047         ulocation--;
00048 
00049         process->m_usedListLocation += sizeof(MEM_LOC);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void used_list_remove(process_t* process, MEM_LOC location)
00053 {
00054         MEM_LOC* ulocation = process->m_usedListRoot;
00055         
00056         unsigned long iter = 0;
00057 
00058         for (iter = 0; iter < process->m_usedListLocation; iter += sizeof(MEM_LOC))
00059         {
00060                 if (*ulocation == location)
00061                 {
00062                         //Fouuund it
00063                         memcpy(ulocation, ulocation + 1, process->m_usedListLocation - iter);
00064 
00065                         process->m_usedListLocation -= sizeof(MEM_LOC);
00066 
00067                         return;
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 ulocation++;
00071         }
00072 }
